channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Back To ‘Life’: Taylor Swift Announces New Album
item.description: 🎶 Brace yourselves for the ultimate Taylor Swift experience! #TaylorSwiftIsBack #NewMusicAlert 🎵

item.title: Mayday Parade Is Ready for a ‘Sad’ Fall
item.description: 🍂 Pump up the jams with @maydayparade's 'Sad' Fall vibes! Who's ready to dance through the season? 🎶 #MaydayParade #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Kaytranada Shares Song From Very Imminent New Album: Listen
item.description: 🎶 Fresh beats alert! @kaytranada drops a sneak peek from his upcoming album! Hit play now! 🚀 #NewMusicAlert #Kaytranada

item.title: Snoop Dogg Confirmed to Perform at 2025 AFL Grand Final
item.description: 🐶🎤 Snoop Dogg bringing the West Coast vibes to the 2025 AFL Grand Final! Let's get ready to drop it like it's hot! 🔥🎶 #SnoopDogg #AFLGrandFinal

item.title: Indie Rock Rallies For Zohran Mamdani Announced With Gift, Wild Pink, Katy Kirby, & More
item.description: Indie vibes are strong with this lineup 🎸 Who's your must-see artist? #IndieRockRallies 🌟 #NewMusicMonday
